createDaily

public static RegularTimeSeries createDaily(RegularTimeSeries ts)
converts data to daily. If given data set has a time interval greater than daily it will be repeated for each day from the previous interval and each value will be that of that in the interval. For the case of time intervals less than daily,they will be period-averaged to give the desired result.

taf2cfs

public static RegularTimeSeries taf2cfs(RegularTimeSeries ts)
converts monthly regular time series data from thousand-acre-feet to cfs. Note: This is not a unit conversion in the ordinary sense as it the factor to be multiplied is dependent upon the month.

cfs2taf

public static RegularTimeSeries cfs2taf(RegularTimeSeries ts)
converts monthly regular time series data from thousand-acre-feet to cfs. Note: This is not a unit conversion in the ordinary sense as it the factor to be multiplied is dependent upon the month.
